title: 全球马格尼茨基人权问责法制裁中共官员， 征集150个签名
contents:
Call for imposing Global Magnitsky Act santions and other measures against Chinese officials and their interests

Help the petition reach its goal, share with others:
URL: https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/call-imposing-global-magnitsky-act-santions-and-other-measures-against-chinese-officials-and-their-interests

150个签名后才会公开，然后目标10万，请大家广泛传播，注意安全
